line_1: Shall envy little Capet's cobbling stool!
line_2: Dash'd from his throne, and made Dame Fortune's Fool,

line_1: Each subtle Priest on three-legg'd stool,
line_2: To take in wise men, play'd the fool.

line_1: And child upon his three-foot stool,
Among th' immortals place her stool:
line_2: There will the busy brain-sick fool
